Recipe.Title: Chicken Salad
Recipe.Description: A healthy and fast lunch option
Recipe.Instructions: Fry the chicken and peppers in olive oil. Stir in the chicken into yoghurt and then put any seasonings. Take a plate and place them all together. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Club Sandwich
Recipe.Instructions: First of all, toast the bread and then spread the mayonnaise on it. Fry the egg, in a fry pan with oil. Then chop it in slices and put it on the bread. Put two slices of tomato on top of it. Put the next slice on top of it. Fried the  and cut it in to small pieces, mix with mayonnise and seasonings. Put it on the top with cheese. Put the bread on top then the toothpick. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Potato Bake
Recipe.Instructions:
Thinly slice potato and add to saucepan of water. Boil until softened. Cube the onion and place it in the saucepan with the potato. Add the milk, cover saucepan and bring to the boil. Then drain. Butter an ovenproof dish and layer half of the potato. Sprinkle half of the onions on top then season. Sprinkle cheese on top.Add rest of the onion and cheese. Enjoy! 
Bake at 190c for 35mins or until crispy and golden. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Stuffed Peppers
Recipe.Instructions: Cut the pepper in half, take out middle but leave stump at the top. Layer the hole pepper in cheese then place in the chopped mushrooms and season with salt and pepper. Then put more cheese on top and also layer top half of pepper with cheese then put the top back on, and cook for 10-20 mins on 150 C. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Tuna Salad
Recipe.Instructions: First of all drain tuna and then mix all the ingedients. Season with salt and pepper..Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Apple Juice Chicken
Recipe.Instructions: Heat a deep pan over medium heat. Add the juice and bring to a low boil. Add in the chicken and season with salt and pepper. Lower everything and cover the pan, cooking for 15 minutes. Flip the chicken over and cook for another 15 minutes, until the juice is thick and syrupy, turning the chicken every 10 minutes or so. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Stuffed Chicken
Recipe.Instructions: Preheat oven to 180 C. Butterfly cut the chicken and cut up the pepper into small pieces.Mix it with the cream cheese and season. Place on the chicken breast, then roll up the chicken breast to enclose the cream cheese mixture. Wrap chicken breast with 1 rasher of bacon, then brush it with melted butter. Bake in the oven for about half an hour or until cooked at 200 C. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Avocado Chicken Salad
Recipe.Instructions: Add ingredients in a bowl and mash with a fork until well combined. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Omelette
Recipe.Instructions: Crack the eggs in a bowl and wisk until all orangy. Put in the bowl all the ingredients: chopped mushroom, onion, bacon and tomatoe. Put this mixture in a pan, on low heat but make sure you put a little bit of fried oil before. After 5 minutes change side, ans as soon as is slighty brown, this means you omelette is ready.Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Sweet Potato Wedges
Recipe.Instructions: Chop the potatoes into wedges shapes. Preheat oven to 180 C. Place into a pan...cover with olive oil, and add some salt and pepper! Cook for 30 minutes at 200 C. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Alternative Pizza Margarita
Recipe.Instructions: Preheat the oven to 180 C. Slice the pitta in half length ways so you get two bases. Spread a spoonful of tomato sauce. Sprinkle some grated cheese and place it on your pizza. Put into the oven and cook until cheese goes stringy. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Spanish Omelette
Recipe.Instructions: Chop the onion and pepper and crush the garlic. Thinly slice the potato. Heat a lot of fried oil in a large pan and then cook the vegetables until soft. Meanwhile beat the eggs in a large bowl then add the vegetable to the eggs and mix gently, trying not to break up the potato. Heat some more oil in the pan and add the mixture. Cook until the underside is golden, then cover with a plate, flip, and slide it back into the pan to cook the other side to match. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Vegetable Pasta
Recipe.Instructions: Chop up your vegetables and put them in an oven dish, add a bit of olive oil, and slosh it about till everything's covered. Put them in the oven until they're all nice and soft. Cook and strain pasta. Mix in your pasta  the tomatoe sauce and then the roasted vegetables. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Macaroni Cheese
Recipe.Instructions: In a pan, boil some water and put in the macaroni for 10 minutes. In another pan melt the butter and add the milk. Also, add some grated cheese, enough cheese that when it melts into the milk/butter consistency it gets quite thick. Add a teaspoon of plain flour.. When the pasta is done drain the water and mix in with the sauce. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Creamy Mushrooms
Recipe.Instructions: Chop the tomato, onion and garlic and slice the mushrooms. Heat the pan on high, and then cook the onion for 1 minute. Add the garlic and the mushrooms. Cook them until the mushrooms are soft. Add the tomatoes and stir it all together. Stir in the double creame and cheese. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Onion Rings
Recipe.Instructions: Firstly taking the cup of self rasing flour and mixing it with water until the consistancy is runny but not too runny. Then add some salt and pepper. Cut the onion into rings and dip them into the mixture. Deep fry them until crispy and brown.Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Quesadillas
Recipe.Instructions: Chop mushroom and onion and saute in fried oil until soft. Place with grated cheese and seasonings in a tortilla and fold in half. Fry in same pan until both sides are brown and crispy. Serve it with yoghurt to dip. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Noodle Soup
Recipe.Instructions: Firstly blend onion, garlic and pepper in the blender. Then slice carrot and take 2.5 cups of water and boil them. Also boil noodles in another pan and when there are quit soft then take the other veggies and put them in. Break an egg over the soup and stir for a few seconds. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Salmon Pasta
Recipe.Instructions: Cook the pasta and drain. Put back into the pan and add the double cream and salmon. Cook on a medium heat for about 3-4 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Enjoy !

Recipe.Title: Ham and Cheese Wrap
Recipe.Instructions: Put a tortilla in a plate. On top of it put the tomato sauce, one slice of ham, some grated cheese and lettuce leaf. Roll it up.. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Simple Pasta
Recipe.Instructions: Add meat to a hot skillet and chop into bite-sized chunks. Then add the onion and the chopped pepper and garlic. Boil pasta and drain. Once the meat is browned add it to the pasta along with the jar of pasta sauce until it's heated through. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Lemonade Scones
Recipe.Instructions: Preheat oven to 200 C. Grease and line a baking tray with either spray oil or baking paper. In a bowl, sift 3 cups of flour, then add the cream and lemonade. Mix the ingredients together and once the mixture becomes like a ball, put flour on the table and put the mixture on the table. Flatten the dough, use a cookie cutter (however size you want) and cut and place on the board. Glaze all the dough with milk. Put it in the oven until they are golden brown. Cool them down and serve... Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Nutella Hot Chocolate
Recipe.Instructions: Pour about 1/4 cup of the milk into the saucepan. Then, add about 2 spoonfuls of nutella. Whisk the milk and nutella together in the saucepan until it's blended. Slowly pour the rest of the milk (3/4 cup) into the saucepan. Stir until it becomes hot & frothy. Carefully pour the mixture into a cup or mug. You're done! You can add anything into the hot chocolate, such as marshmallows/ whipped cream etc. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Pasta Bolognese
Recipe.Instructions: Heat some olive oil in a pan, the add the beef mince and stirring til broken up and fully browned. Add pepper and salt for seasoning and the garlic. quickly add the can of chopped tomatoes, and the two passatas as to not allow the garlic to burn. Boil pasta and then drain... Put mince in pasta and ready... Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Easy Shepherds Pie
Recipe.Instructions: Prepare the mash potato. Cook the minced beef and add the grated carrot, chopped tomatoes and salt and pepper for taste. Add mash potato and minced beef in a pan, and sprinke with cheese. Cook for about 40 minutes at 200 C. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Tomato and Bacon Risotto
Recipe.Instructions: Chop and fry the onion with fried oil. Boil and stir rice, til starts to go clear. Add the tomato puree. Stir well and add a cupful to the rice. Afterwards add the chopped tomatoes. Cook and stir til it's absorbed. Keep adding water if necessary until the rice is cooked. Add salt and pepper and stir for the last time. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Ribs
Recipe.Instructions: Mix all the ingredients together. Pour over pork belly ribs. Cook for 1hour and 30 minutes at 180 C. Then turn down the oven to 130 C and for a futher 30 minutes. Enjoy !

Recipe.Title: Pork Chops
Recipe.Instructions: Trim chops and remove excess fat. Beat egg lightly and toss the chops in this. Pile stuffing on a piece of greaseproof paper and coat chops both sides. Cook at 200 C for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Ten minutes before end of cooking time place pineapple and tomato in roasting tin with chops. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Schnitzel
Recipe.Instructions: Cut meat into sliced and beat the meat. Make 3 plates: one with flour, one with a beaten egg and one with breadcrumbs. 1- cover the meat with a thin layer of flour, 2- dunk wholly into, usually one, beaten egg, 3- cover in bread crumbs. Heat a thin layer of oil in a frying pan. Add breaded meat. Turn pieces over when side is cooked. Oil evaporates so add enough so that the oil is always about halfway up the meat edge. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Mexican Supper
Recipe.Instructions: Heat oil in a large pan and saute chopped onions. Cut peppers into strips and add them into pan as well. Cut sausages into chunks and wait until peppers and onions are browned and then add sausages. Then peal the potato and cut it into chunks and put in a pan of boiling water. Wait 5 minutes. Drain water from potates and then smash them. Put sausages into a deep bowl or dish and cover with mashed potatoes and put in the oven at 180 C for 15 minutes. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Nutella French toast
Recipe.Instructions: Spread nutella on one slice of bread and lay marshmallows in top. Then put your second slice of bread on top. Lay a chosen amount of butter to a frying pan and let it sizle for 30 seconds. Put your sandwich in the fried butter into the pan and let it fry until it is golden. Flip the bread over and do the same with the other side. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Cheesy Pizza Bagels
Recipe.Instructions: Cut the bagels in half. Cover them with tomato ketchup. Add the grated cheese. Grill in medium heat until the cheese has melted and turned golden brown. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Pasta n Pesto
Recipe.Instructions: Boil and drain pasta. Add pesto and stir in also grated cheese & chopped chicken. Also add the veggies - who sauted before in fried oil until golden. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Oreo Tart
Recipe.Instructions: Blend oreo and 1/4th cup of butter to make a paste. Spread it on the mould and press it well to make a base. Freeze it for 10 mins. Melt nutella in a pan and add the other 1/4th cup of butter and mix well. Spread it on the frozen base. Freeze it for 2 hours. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Vegetarian Wraps
Recipe.Instructions: Chop tomato and spinach in pieces. Add oil to the pan and heat. Fry spinach and tomato until spinach is shriveled.Warm tortillas in the microwave for around 15-30 seconds. Cut goat's cheese in pieces and add on the wrap, then add the spinach and tomato. Season with salt and pepper. Roll wraps and serve, maybe with salad, if you wish. Enjoy!

Recipe.Title: Mushroom Pie
Recipe.Instructions: Boil and then mash the potatoes. Place a layer of mash potato on the bottom of a casserole dish. Cut up and fry the mushrooms with olive oil. After a few minutes crush and add the garlic and chopped peppers. Add a layer of vegetables on the mash potato and then cook it in the oven for 20 minutes at 180 C. Enjoy!
